column4: Hi, my Firefox 15 crashes on some sites with Flash video, but Youtube flash videos work fine (on lucid with flash 11.2 r202) - the fun is Firefox started up with a clean profile does not crash (have tried Flash-aid, flash 11.1, mms.cfg tweaks)
I think it's related to javascript - with NoScript active, the problematic page loads fine without the video, but immediately after I temporally allow scripts, FF crashes
making a fresh profile will isolate plugin issues / profile as the cause of the issues
yeah, I know - last thing to try is to disable all add-ons and enable them one-by-one....
